short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2022-10-21
description: Inductively Couple Plasma- Optical Emission Spectrometer (ICP-OES). Background Environment and Climate Change Canada, National Laboratory for Environmental Testing – Burlington, ON has a requirement for the supply, delivery, installation and training of one mercury Inductively Coupled Plasma – Optical Emission Spectrometer (ICP-OES) as detailed in Annex A.
